page.title: 15TRAFFIC (2): WARLEY, ESSEX
page.content: The construction of the M25 has had several effects on the area. Distance traffic is now encouraged to pass through the area, increasing local {traffic noise.}Some roads have been blocked off, e.g. at 578898, although a footbridge and facilities for farm vehicles have been built. Those living near the M25 have seen the{value}of their{houses depreciate.}On the positive side, however,{blocked-off {lanes}or those along which very little traffic now passes have taken on a new character. Verge cutting is rare along them so that{wild flowers}are more in evidence. The lack of disturbance has encouraged both{nesting birds}and the {smaller mammals.}These lanes are beginning to resume the appearance of the Essex landscape as painted by Constable - this in a location only some twenty miles from Tower Bridge.
